note:
I'm a SF/F author, small press editor, gamer and creativity addict. She/her. I like so many creative pursuits: sewing, knitting, crochet, gardening, crafting, gaming, drawing and digital art. Also an avid reader of SF/F/Mysteries and lover of all things science. Canadian and not sorry.

Header image is a series of book covers for my space opera Nearspace series; avatar image is a closeup of the main character from one of the covers. Art by Ashley Walters.
